name: The Undying Plague
description: The Undying Plague is a top down shooter where your task is to fend off waves of attacking enemies and survive as long as possible. At your disposal will get a few weapons that we can improve for the money earned on the battlefield. Enter a world of pain, suffering and bloodthirsty zombies. Can you stop the plague?
minimum_requirements: Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT610 2GB DDR3 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum display size: 1280x720
